changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.modify_guild_abillity') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_abillity
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.modify_guild_abillity') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_abillity GO
